about_the_game:
As the only survivor on remote Yacy Island, you find yourself in a relentless challenge to stay alive amidst a society of werewolves.

Build, explore and survive on this mysterious island, find raw materials and supplies to stay alive.

Cut down trees to build camps and light fires to stay warm. Seek food to avoid hunger. Build shelters to stay safe and protect your items. Explore the world to understand what is happening to the island, but do so very carefully.

Take advantage of the sunlight to hunt, craft weapons, and collect supplies for use at night, when werewolves will be on the loose and you will be at a disadvantage.

The island harbors deep secrets, and your discoveries will shape your journey to survival. In "Resilience: Lunar", the moon dictates destiny, and your resilience is your greatest weapon. Face the dangers of the night, explore the mysterious and prepare for an epic fight for freedom amid the cursed island of Yaci.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain violence, blood and animal cruelty. It can be sensitive to those who are afraid of being in dense forests, darkness, high places and closed spaces. Not recommended for those with lucophobia or lycanthrophobia.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I5-8400 or AMD RYZEN 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 570 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: INTEL CORE I7-8700K or AMD RYZEN 5 3600X
  • Memory: 12 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1080Ti or AMD Radeon RX 5700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection

short_description: Lunar Resilience – Survive the werewolves, build your fortress, craft items and weaponry, hunt animals, feed yourself, hydrate yourself and stay resilient.Explore and uncover the island’s mysteries. If you're afraid to go alone, feel free to invite your friends to go with you.
